meanings.sent1: I love the different typestyles used in the book.
meanings.sent2: The magazine has a variety of typestyles for each article.
meanings.sent3: The typestyles on the menu made the dishes look even more delicious.
meanings.sent4: Her handwriting had a unique typestyle that stood out from the rest.
meanings.sent5: The typestyles in the logo gave it a modern and sleek look.

meanings.definition: The style or appearance of printed matter.
meanings.sent1: The typestyles of the posters caught my eye.
meanings.sent2: The typestyles used in the brochure were elegant and easy to read.
meanings.sent3: The mismatched typestyles on the flyer made it hard to understand.
meanings.sent4: The typestyles of the invitations set the tone for the event.
meanings.sent5: The typestyles in the magazine ad were bold and attention-grabbing.
